participant_1.background:
I once went to the Maldives and felt like a princess in a tropical paradise.
i love to fish.
i m a kindergarten teacher.
I don't have a car, but I do have a great reading nook in my house.
I have been reminiscing about my childhood while watching my kids play in the creek.

participant_2.background:
I have a lust for my neighbor's pool boy, and a need to be creative.
I'm looking for a home with a large closet so I can have plenty of space for my sewing supplies.
I play the harmonica in my spare time.
i sing barbershop and rap.
I want someone who can make me laugh and share my love of pizza.

content.text: Hello! How is your day going?
Hey, it's going good so far! I am just getting ready to go out to a bbq with my friends. What are you up to?
I'm just hanging out, watching my kids play in the creek.  I miss the Maldives, I felt like a princess there!
That sounds lovely! I've never been to the Maldives, but it sounds amazing. I love to travel.
I've been to a lot of places! I've been to Europe, Asia, and even Africa.
Wow, that's amazing! I'm so jealous. I've only been to a few countries.
You should definitely travel more! It's so much fun to experience different cultures.
I know, I know! I'm planning on taking a trip to Europe next year.
That's awesome! Where in Europe are you going?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about going to Italy.
Italy is beautiful! I've been there twice, and I loved it.
I'm glad to hear that! I'm really excited to go.
You're going to have a great time
